results.definition: a principle that limits the extent of something
examples: I am willing to accept certain restrictions on my movements

results.definition: the quality of being limited or restricted
examples: it is a good plan but it has serious limitations

results.definition: the greatest amount of something that is possible or allowed
examples: there are limits on the amount you can bet
it is growing rapidly with no limitation in sight

results.definition: (law) a time period after which suits cannot be brought
an act of limiting or restricting (as by regulation)
